import { Link, } from "react-router-dom"; import '../css/styleSIGNUP.css'; function Cart({ cartItems }) { //console.log("cartItems=====: "+cartItems[0].productName); let totalPrice = 0; return ( <>

{ cartItems.map((cItem) => ( <>

Price
{cItem.price}
{totalPrice = totalPrice + cItem.price}
Delete
))}
Pay Total {totalPrice}
); } export default Cart;
